issue_1_dimensional_epsilon.problem: ε treated inconsistently as dimensionless and having dimensions

resolution.key_insight: At QCD scale, ε̃ ~ 1 (not small); suppression comes from Planck-Hubble ratio

resolution.epsilon_4_mechanism: QCD Taylor expansion: v_χ ~ r near center
resolution.epsilon_2_mechanism: Holographic: energy distributed among S_H ~ (L_H/ℓ_P)² DOFs

claim_1_algebraic_phases.verification: Phases are cube roots of unity from SU(3) rep theory

claim_2_identical_structure.statement: All stella octangula share identical phase structure

claim_3_no_causal_requirement.statement: Coherence does NOT require causal contact
claim_3_no_causal_requirement.verification: Phases are definitional, not dynamically established

issue_3_theorem_5_2_2_verification.conclusion: No circular dependency; coherence is algebraic, not dynamical
